parse.title: Tortured soul (Port Phasmatys)
parse.text:
Tortured soul
This article is about the non-player character found in Port Phasmatys. For other uses, see Tortured soul (disambiguation).
Tortured soul

ExamineThis poor soul cannot understand why it has not passed to the next world.

Tortured souls are ghostly apparitions which can be found north of the Ectofuntus and west of Port Phasmatys, outside the city walls. Their appearance, location, name and speech imply that they are outcasts from Port Phasmatys who, being trapped between life and death due to the actions of Necrovarus (rectified by the player during Ghosts Ahoy), have lost their minds. When killed they sometimes say, rather ironically, "You cannot defeat the undead, mortal!"

As they are a type of ghost, they can be used as a higher level substitute on ghost Slayer tasks assigned by Turael/Spria and Mazchna. Since Tortured Souls are undead, the Salve amulet is effective against them.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • update 15 February 2005 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • As of 4 July 2011, many worlds had one of the then-new citadel ruins on top of a tortured soul spawn point effectively creating a tortured soul players could not attack. If players did attempt to attack it, even with Ranged or Magic, they received a "You can't reach that." message.
  • While the normal ghosts had their sounds updated, the Tortured Souls still use the old ghost sounds.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Stu's Twitter account. 17 November 2017. (Archived from the original on 22 January 2019.) Mod Stu: "Had a look at the code: * It only drops on member worlds * Looks like a 1/1,000 drop chance, no modifiers * It just flags a variable and messages "You have unlocked the ability to burn bones on bonfires!", so it's easy to miss you've unlocked it"
